name: Day 'n' Nite
description:
Became the Tron Javolta of the Boogie Woogie Dance. This is your one and only dream. So hit the floor, dance like hell and gain FAME.

But if you waana dance you must work too. This days requires money, you know. Before sitting on the Boogie Woogie throne you are just a little office shit. Dance to change it!

==========================================================

ZESPÓŁ:

Nikola Müller  - Grafikowanie i Animowanie

Aroń Pietroń -  Grafikowanie

Piotr Sudoł - Programowanie

Martin Sikora - Projektowanie i duperelowanie

Jesteśmy na 2 piętrze, tuż przy schodach i wyjściu na taras.
